data.name: Marincess Cascade
data.desc: Banish any number of "Marincess" Link Monsters you control (until your next Standby Phase), then target 1 face-up monster on the field; it gains ATK equal to the total Link Rating of the monsters banished to activate this card x 300, until the end of this turn. If you control a Link-3 or higher "Marincess" monster, you can activate this card from your hand.

card_sets.set_name: 2020 Tin of Lost Memories Mega Pack
